questionCopy: Is the community in the desired location?
Is there easy access to the main road?
Is it within reasonable proximity to your home?
Is the facility close to a hospital?
Is the parking lot well lighted?
Is the gate managed by a person 24 hours a day?
Is the outside area protected from the elements?
Is there a covered entrance for pick up and drop off of residents?
Is there a seperate entrance for deliveries?
Is there a seperate entrance for staff?
Is the overall appearance of the property satisfactory?
Is the landscaping neat and well taken care of?
Are the enough parking spaces for the residents and guests?
Is there an outside area for residents to enjoy?
Is there enough outside seating for residents and family?
